On March 16 we sent the tapes mentioned by John Holt. Evidently
THEY HAVE BEEN LOST IN THE MAIL. THEREFORE, WE ARE SENDING, UNDER
SEPARATE COVER, SIX NEW TAPES FOR YOUR USE. THESE TAPES WILL BE
BLANK, AS WE COULD NOT DUPLICATE AGAIN THE PROGRAMS MENTIONED BY
John. Please let me know when these new tapes arrive.
Best regards.
SINC ER ELY,
Robert £. Underwood, Jr.
